body: The lolicon dream.
Aw man it's been ages since I've read this, after reading truck loads of mindless shit the subtle beauty of hentai like this is such a breath of fresh air.
Too bad people this is a oneshot manga 😩
SEQUEL SEQUEL SEQUEL !!!!
See, now thus was wholesome, no need to insert pedophiles.
Ez Fav 💯 💯 💯
What a mess... but it's better than most plot in this site.
GOD SAVE THE PET LOLI! (or whatever she is)
WE NEED A SEQUEL. Please, just give her a good life
I love it but fucking hell does the female character has to have a messed up backstory?
I demand MOrE!!!!
Matsuura_mikazuya : i feel you my man
whoa, this is... something. that backstory is fucking terrible but everything else makes up for it! so damn cute, especially the bonus panels. definately needs more vanilla sequels
ok. kinda cute even i feel a little bad for her past.

@some_fucking_Asshole guy: you're right, i forgot to  say that my english is terrible, also u should try living in 3th world country and do exactly what the MC doing in this doujin to confirm my statement... and i prefer coffee cause its darker than bleach LOL!

@Matsuuru_Mikazuya You're a fucking dipshit. First of all, go to school and learn some English. Second of all, it's extremely obvious you're spouting bullshit. You're literally spewing nonsensical strings of words that make no contextual, situational, conventional, or grammatical sense. Go drink bleach.

this's a true story...
so i lost my wallet, laptop, and other documents in my bag ofc. she stayed in my apartment for 1 days 2 night (probably to remove my suspicion of her). but ALL WAS EXPECTED, she fail to realize that theres tracking device inside my bag, laptop, and wallet. Yes i've alot of a fucking Tracking device cause this's not the first shit that happens to me.
the next day "we" found her on riverside along with her friends who turnup to be a bunch of college students including herself. one of my co-worker ask me "should we fuck the chick?" and so i said "** ***** ***"

im not saying that we shouldnt help the poor, but be careful, im already lucky enough that she didnt try to silence me before running away with my stuff...
Thanks for this useful advise dipshit! xoxoxo
don't do this, report to police if you ever encounter a similar situation.
